quotes.en: You are safe in this moment.
One step is still progress.
Breathe. You're doing your best.
You don't have to do it all today.
quotes.zh-TW: 你不必今天就完成所有事。

quotes.en: Your feelings make sense.
You are allowed to rest.
You are more than your thoughts.
Small wins count.
You are learning, not failing.
quotes.zh-TW: 你正在學習，而不是失敗。

quotes.en: You can start again right now.
quotes.zh-TW: 你現在就可以重新開始。

quotes.en: You are worthy of care.
You deserve kindness—especially from you.
quotes.zh-TW: 你值得善待——尤其是來自你自己。

quotes.en: Your pace is valid.
You are not behind.
Your effort matters.
You can handle this moment.
You are allowed to ask for help.
You are growing in quiet ways.
You are doing enough.
You are not a burden.
Let today be imperfect.
quotes.zh-TW: 讓今天不完美也沒關係。

quotes.en: You can be soft and strong.
You are allowed to take up space.
Your needs are important.
You are allowed to feel proud.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以為自己感到驕傲。

quotes.en: Your body deserves respect.
You are not your past.
You are not alone.
You are supported, even when unseen.
quotes.zh-TW: 即使看不見，你也有人支持。

quotes.en: You can choose peace.
You can trust yourself a little more.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以更相信自己一點。

quotes.en: You are allowed to slow down.
Your heart knows how to heal.
You are brave for showing up.
quotes.zh-TW: 能出現就已經很勇敢了。

quotes.en: You can do hard things gently.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以溫柔地做困難的事。

quotes.en: Your emotions are not too much.
You don't need to prove your worth.
quotes.zh-TW: 你不需要證明自己的價值。

quotes.en: You are allowed to be a beginner.
You can release what you can't control.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以放下無法控制的事。

quotes.en: You are becoming.
quotes.zh-TW: 你正在成為更好的自己。

quotes.en: You can take a small breath and continue.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以輕輕呼吸，然後繼續。

quotes.en: You are allowed to change your mind.
You are allowed to set boundaries.
You can protect your peace.
Your voice matters.
You are not defined by one moment.
You deserve to feel steady.
You can take it one hour at a time.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以一小時一小時來。

quotes.en: You can choose what nourishes you.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以選擇滋養你的事物。

quotes.en: You are enough—right now.
quotes.zh-TW: 現在的你就已經足夠了。

quotes.en: You can be kind to your future self.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以善待未來的自己。

quotes.en: You can let go of perfection.
You are allowed to be human.
You can be proud of surviving.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以為撐過來而驕傲。

quotes.en: You are allowed to feel joy without guilt.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以無愧地感受快樂。

quotes.en: You can honor your limits.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以尊重自己的極限。

quotes.en: You can pause without quitting.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以暫停而不是放棄。

quotes.en: You are allowed to heal in your own way.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以用自己的方式療癒。

quotes.en: You can soften your shoulders.
You are doing better than you think.
You can trust the process.
You can meet yourself with compassion.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以用慈悲對待自己。

quotes.en: You are allowed to take breaks.
You can release old expectations.
You are not late to your life.
You can be present without being perfect.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以在場而不必完美。

quotes.en: You are allowed to say "no."
You can choose a kinder thought.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以選擇更溫柔的想法。

quotes.en: You can return to your center.
You are worthy of good things.
quotes.zh-TW: 你值得擁有美好的事物。

quotes.en: You can make space for your feelings.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以為你的感受留出空間。

quotes.en: You are allowed to feel uncertain.
You can be gentle with your nervous system.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以溫柔對待你的神經系統。

quotes.en: You can take a slow breath.
You can keep going, slowly.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以慢慢地繼續前進。

quotes.en: You are not broken.
You can do less and still be valuable.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以做少一點，仍然有價值。

quotes.en: You are allowed to protect your energy.
You can be proud of your progress.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以為你的進步感到驕傲。

quotes.en: You can start small.
You are allowed to be supported.
You can trust your inner wisdom.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以相信你內在的智慧。

quotes.en: You are safe to be yourself.
You can choose one helpful next step.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以選擇一個有幫助的下一步。

quotes.en: You are allowed to feel deeply.
You can learn from this without judging yourself.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以從中學習而不評判自己。

quotes.en: You are allowed to celebrate small things.
You can be patient with your growth.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以對自己的成長有耐心。

quotes.en: You are allowed to feel proud of trying.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以為嘗試而感到驕傲。

quotes.en: You can find your way through.
You are worthy of love and respect.
You can breathe through discomfort.
You are allowed to have needs.
You can come back to now.
You are not too sensitive.
You can be gentle and still move forward.
You can give yourself permission to rest.
You are doing the best you can with what you have.
quotes.zh-TW: 你已經用你所擁有的盡力了。

quotes.en: You can trust tomorrow to meet you.
quotes.zh-TW: 你可以相信明天會來迎接你。

quotes.en: You are safe to begin again.
